text:
I run a $25K/mo brand with zero employees.

Most founders are drowning in 'engagement' and 'content creation.'

I just built a second brain that never sleeps.

Here are the 5 AI automations running my brand on autopilot.
image_concept: Duncan in his signature orange hoodie, leaning against a railing on a Barcelona terrace. He looks relaxed, checking his phone while the city stretches out behind him in warm stone and Mediterranean tiles. Direct gaze, 'operator' energy.

text:
The bottleneck isn't talent. It's manual labor.

If you're still manually posting to 5 platforms or 'brainstorming' for 2 hours, you're losing.

Scale comes from systems, not 'hustle.'

These 5 n8n workflows do 80% of my heavy lifting.
image_concept: Close-up detail shot on the Barcelona terrace: An espresso cup on a small tiled table next to a MacBook. The screen is visible but blurred, showing a complex n8n node structure. Warm, Mediterranean morning light.

text:
Automation 1: The Repurpose Engine

I post one TikTok. AI takes over.

It strips the watermark, rewrites the caption for LinkedIn/X, and auto-posts to IG and YT Shorts.

Result: 5x reach. 0 extra minutes spent.
image_concept: SCREENSHOT_NEEDED: The 'Content Repurpose Engine' workflow in n8n. Show the TikTok trigger connecting to OpenAI nodes for caption rewriting, and branching out to LinkedIn, YouTube, and Instagram nodes.

text:
Automation 2: Trend Research Pipeline

Stop guessing what your audience wants.

Every Monday, AI scans Reddit and YouTube for my niche's biggest pain points.

It compiles a 'Content Cheat Sheet' directly in my Slack. I just pick a topic and film.
image_concept: Infographic: A clean flow diagram showing icons for Reddit and YouTube feeding into a central 'AI Brain' (n8n logo), which then outputs a 'Content Idea List' into Slack. Use a clean, modern aesthetic that matches the Barcelona theme colors (terracotta, stone, deep blue).

text:
Automation 3 & 4: The Content Loop

3. Comment Scraper: Scrapes my YT comments -> AI extracts the best questions -> adds to my 'to-do' list.

4. Carousel Gen: I drop a topic -> AI writes 7 slides + generates image prompts. (Yes, it helped build this).
image_concept: Duncan in his orange hoodie, sitting at a stone table on the Barcelona terrace. He's looking at his laptop, appearing focused and productive. The city view is visible in the background.

text:
Automation 5: Smart Lead Scoring

New lead joins my Skool community -> AI analyzes their profile/answers -> scores them based on revenue.

High-value leads get a personal DM. Others get routed to a specific email sequence.

No manual sorting. Just ROI.
image_concept: Establishing shot of the Barcelona terrace and the surrounding architecture at golden hour. The focus is on the environment, conveying a sense of freedom and 'business on autopilot' while Duncan is seen in the distance, not working.

text:
These 5 automations save me 20+ hours every single week.

I grew 110K followers in 12 months because I spent my time on strategy, not clicking buttons.

Stop being a worker. Start being an operator.
